title.narrative: NGO Support / Supporting Long-Term Planning Capacity for Conflict Prevention

description.narrative: The objective of this project is to support peace and security in the Middle East by enhancing state planning capacity in conflict prevention, particularly with regard to economic, socio-political and environmental threats. Currently conflict prevention is security-centric and often ad-hoc, reactive and short-term. The immediate objectives are thus 1) to increase awareness in state administrations of the impact of non-military trends on future conflicts, 2) to build their capacity in conflict prevention in the aforementioned fields 3) to build the capacity of local partners to apply participatory foresight methodologies and 4) to improve dialogue on regional challenges in conflict prevention. This is done through a participatory foresight project involving s tate officials, advisors and local think tanks.
